constructor.details: Factory sets up a new hash time lock contract and providing the receiver lock terms.

params._backup: Backup address for sending the token in case of                 unsuccessful swap
params._target: Receiver of the token in case of successful swap.
params._timeLock: UNIX epoch seconds time that the lock expires at.                 Refunds can be made after this time.

refund().details: Called by the sender if there was no withdraw AND the time lock has expired. This will refund the contract amount.

withdraw(uint256[2]).details: Called by the receiver once they know the rawSecret of the hashedSecret. This will transfer the locked funds to their address.

params._rawSecret: uint(sha256(_rawSecret)) should equal the contract hashedSecret.

devdoc.title: Hashed Timelock Contracts for using with ERC20.
